verse: Then some of his disciples said to one another, “What does he mean by saying to us, ‘In a little while you will no longer see me, and then a short time later you will see me again,’ and ‘Because I am going to the Father’?
What is this ‘little while’? We do not know what he means.”
Jesus knew that they wanted to question him, so he said to them,
“At last you are speaking plainly,” his disciples said, “and not using figures of speech.
Now we realize that you know everything and do not need to have anyone question you. Because of this, we believe that you came from God.”
